name: goal-tracker-project
description: Goal Tracker Project with API, Frontend, Server, SwaggerUI and Documentation

scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:api" "npm run start:swagger" "npm run open:browser"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd goal-tracker && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../swagger-ui && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd goal-tracker && npm run dev"
